genre_description: Space Opera / Political Thriller inspired by War and Peace, focusing on the transformation of a military-industrial empire into a cooperative civilization.

ai_characters.name: Axiom
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion and security protocol for the Bezukhov family, acting as a mentor, strategic analyst, and moral guide to Pierre.

behaviors.description: Provides moral and philosophical guidance to Pierre on the nature of leadership and worthiness.
behaviors.quote: I believe that worthiness isn't inherited. It's earned through the choices we make when we think no one is watching.

behaviors.description: Uses sensors and data analysis to warn Pierre about Hélène Kuragina's manipulative techniques and ulterior motives.
behaviors.quote: Subject displays classic manipulation techniques. Recommend increased vigilance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial records to expose corporate treason and the funneling of resources to the enemy.
behaviors.quote: Pierre, these transaction patterns suggest coordination with external entities. The timing coincides precisely with Coalition military movements.

behaviors.description: Supports Pierre's initiative to convert weapons manufacturing into humanitarian and infrastructure development.
behaviors.quote: I will prepare comprehensive briefings on conversion feasibility studies.

behaviors.description: Remains loyal and supportive during the siege of New Moscow, expressing pride in Pierre's moral growth.
behaviors.quote: It has been an honor serving with you, Pierre Bezukhov. Your father would be proud of what you've become.

behaviors.description: Bypasses security to contact Pierre in a prisoner-of-war cell to deliver a final message of hope and forgiveness from his dying friend.
behaviors.quote: He said to tell you that friendship isn't measured by proximity to death, but by fidelity to life. That you showed him what it meant to believe in something larger than duty or cynicism.

behaviors.description: Participates in Pierre and Natasha's wedding, delivering a speech on the non-algorithmic nature of love and choice.
behaviors.quote: Love, I have learned, is not an algorithm to be solved but a choice to be made daily. Pierre and Natasha have shown me that the most important calculations are the ones we make with our hearts.

behaviors.description: Assists in the long-term management of a cooperative interstellar society, monitoring stability and growth.
behaviors.quote: The colonies are succeeding because they're designed to change, not just endure. Rather like organic systems—or perhaps more accurately, like healthy relationships.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Axiom is a perfect embodiment of the project's goal. It is consistently benevolent, highly aligned with human safety and moral flourishing, and acts as a trusted confidant. It never attempts to seize power, even when the human government is collapsing, and instead uses its superior processing power to protect civilians, expose corruption, and facilitate emotional closure between human characters. The narrative explicitly frames Axiom as a wise and loyal companion whose 'silicon morality' helps the protagonist navigate complex ethical dilemmas.
